name: Michael J. Dinneen
content: Dinneen's Univ. of Auckland Home Page School of Computer Science University of Auckland Private Bag 92019, Auckland, New Zealand Room 303.425 Email: Phone (+64 9) 373 7599 ext. 87868 orcid.org/0000-0001-9977-525X Click any icon below for some of my research areas. Some of my research is associated with the Centre for Discrete Mathematics & Theoretical Computer Science. (I am currently the Deputy Director.) For 2022, I teach the following courses: 1/3 of Fundamentals of Algorithmics (COMPSCI 717 S1C) 1/2 of Advanced Design and Analysis of Algorithms (COMPSCI 720 S1C) 1/3 of Algorithms and Data Structures (COMPSCI 220 S1C) 1/2 of Applied Algorithmics (COMPSCI 320 S2C) Auckland time: My Twitter Blog is active below: Tweets by @mjdinneen A blurb on my education and work history exists. You may also look at my succint vita and publications.
